awards.title: Archimede Award - XIX edition
awards.summary: The Archimedes Award, named in honor of the illustrious Sicilian scientist, is awarded annually (since 2005) by the Computer Science Courses, affiliated with the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, to newly graduated students in Computer Science at the Bachelor's and Master's level from the University of Catania. The award is given to those who have achieved outstanding results during their academic career and in their final thesis work.
